The '''Ubuntu Font Family''' are a set of matching new libre/open fonts initially developed during 2010-2011. The font was released under a libre-licence and is '''now packaged in Ubuntu 10.10 and later versions'''. Work is on-going to continue to improve the font.

* https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/fonts-ubuntu/+bugs?orderby=-id&start=0 (Ubuntu bug tracker)
* https://github.com/canonical/Ubuntu-Sans-fonts
* https://github.com/canonical/Ubuntu-Sans-Mono-fonts

=== History ===
For information about the development of the font, and its history within the project, see <nowiki>[[UbuntuFontFamily-History|History]]</nowiki>.

=== Testing ===
To find out more information about testing proposed font changes, see <nowiki>[[UbuntuFontFamily-Testing|Testing]]</nowiki>.
